full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA nI'I BUM BSGRUB KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZAD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(TSUL 'DI YANG KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO MGON PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG @011A *, ,BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I CHOG LA GZHI BYAS, ,RGYAL BA YAB SRAS SOGS KYI GSUNG GIS ZUR BRGYAN TE SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIG MED RGYA MTSOS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA'I RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIG MED RGYA MTSO,
